# planetscale Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Service-id based configuration for the Planetscale provider
provider "planetscale" {
  service_token_id = "my-token-id"
  service_token    = "my-token"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `service_token` (String)
- `service_token_id` (String)
